title: Self Validation Exercises
introText: Self-validation is a fundamental skill in DBT (Dialectical Behavior Therapy) that involves acknowledging your emotions, thoughts, and experiences as understandable and valid – even when they're painful or you wish you felt differently.

exercises.title: Self-Validation Practice
exercises.description: Practice acknowledging your emotions, accepting them without judgment, and responding with compassion through structured validation steps.

bePatientCard.title: Be Patient With Yourself
bePatientCard.description: Self-validation isn't about agreeing with every thought or feeling—it's about acknowledging that your emotions make sense given your experience. Practice treating yourself with the same kindness you'd offer a good friend.
